title: Pizzeria La Pecora Nera
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Pizza, Italian, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a section on the menu very specifically marked as vegan (vegano in Italian). There are about 10 or so pizzas listed under this section. There are many different toppings, including rice-based cheese, seitan-based fake meat and tofu. As well there are various crust options including whole wheat.
